en: Hear my prayer, O Jehovah; give ear to my supplications: In thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.
hmr: Aw Lalpa, ka ṭawngṭâina hi ngai la, lunginsiet ka hninaa hin na lo sit la, I ringumna le felna leiin mi hung dawn rawh.

en: And enter not into judgment with thy servant; For in thy sight no man living is righteous.
hmr: I siehlaw chunga hin rorêl naw la, I mithmua chun mihring hrim hrim thiem chang an um âwm si nawh a.

en: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; He hath smitten my life down to the ground: He hath made me to dwell in dark places, as those that have been long dead.
hmr: Dotu chun ka hringna a suknawmna sih a, Ka hringna hi hnuoiah a vuok thlûk a; Thi ta daihai angin hmun inthimtakahai a mîn umtir a.

en: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; My heart within me is desolate.
hmr: Chuleiin, ka thlarau hi ka sûngah a châu a, Ka lungril hi ka sûngah a lunginzîng tah.

en: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy doings; I muse on the work of thy hands.
hmr: Tienlai nihai chu ka hriet zing hlak a, I thilthaw po pohai chu ka ngaituo hlak a; I kut sinthawhai chu ka sût hlak.

en: I spread forth my hands unto thee: My soul thirsteth after thee, as a weary land. [Selah
hmr: Ka kuthai hi nanga tieng ka phar hlak a, Ka hringna hi ram châutak angin, nangmaah a dangchâr hlak.

en: Make haste to answer me, O Jehovah; my spirit faileth: Hide not thy face from me, Lest I become like them that go down into the pit.
hmr: Aw Lalpa, mi hung dawn vak la, ka thlarau a châu ding a ni hi; Ka kuoma hin i hmai thup naw la, Chuong naw chun khura zu fehai ang elin hung um rawi ka tih.

en: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; For in thee do I trust: Cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; For I lift up my soul unto thee.
hmr: Zîngkâr chun i ngilneina thu mîn hriettir la, Nang ka ring si cheh a; Ka fena ding lampui chu mîn hriettir la; Ka lungril hi i kuomah ka sie tlat hlak sih a.

en: Deliver me, O Jehovah, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.
hmr: Aw LALPA, a mi dotuhaia inthawk chun mi sanhim la, I mi thuphmang dingin i kuomah ka hung tlân a nih.

en: Teach me to do thy will; For thou art my God: Thy Spirit is good; Lead me in the land of uprightness.
hmr: I dit zâwng thaw mîn chûktir la, ka Pathien i ni sih a, I thlarau chu a ṭha a nih, ram indiktaka chun mi ṭhuoi rawh.

en: Quicken me, O Jehovah, for thy name’s sake: In thy righteousness bring my soul out of trouble.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i hming leiin mi sukhar la; I felna leiin ka hringna hi lunginzîngnaa inthawkin ṭhuoi suok rawh.

en: And in thy lovingkindness cut off mine enemies, And destroy all them that afflict my soul; For I am thy servant.
hmr: I ngilneina leiin a mi dotuhai chu sukbohmang la, Ka hringna suklungzîngtu po po sukbohmang la; I siehlaw ka ni sih a.
